definition: Macheng county level city in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
surname Ma
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Speaking of Fortune kiln, not only hemp cities, mountains are famous throughout the eastern Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 說起富鑫窯，不單麻城市，整個鄂東山區都赫赫有名。
